comment._content: If you have any information regarding the individuals within the picture, please leave  a comment.

comment.author: 7711591@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Jewish People and History - Ancient and Modern, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 49603158@N02
comment._content:
I think that my dad, George Eiesenberg is in that picture. He was in the US Army Air Corp at that time. These men may also be in the Army Air Corp (that preceded the US Air Force).
Martin Eisenberg

comment.author: 60784740@N08
comment._content: A great picture that shows how important celebrating together as Jews was to those who were serving around the world and away from their families!
